### Dataframe
```{R}
data("iris")
head(iris)
tail(iris, 10)
str(iris)
summary(iris)

iris[1,]
iris[,'Sepal.Length']

#use $
iris$Sepal.Length
iris$Species=="setosa"
iris[iris$Species=="setosa",]

#使用which 做資料篩選
#which開頭函數回傳的是符合條件樣本的index
which(iris$Species=="setosa")

which.min(iris$Sepal.Length)
which.max(iris$Sepal.Length)

#用order做資料排序
iris[order(iris$Sepal.Length, decreasing = TRUE),]
sort(iris$Sepal.Length, decreasing = TRUE)

#merge進行資料合併
df1 = data.frame(CustomerId = c(1:6), Product = c(rep("Toaster", 3), rep("Radio", 3)))
df2 = data.frame(CustomerId = c(2, 4, 6), State = c(rep("Alabama", 2), rep("Ohio", 1)))

#Inner join:
merge(x = df1, y= df2, by="CustomerId")

#Outer join: 
merge(x = df1, y = df2, by = "CustomerId", all = TRUE)

#Left outer: 
merge(x = df1, y = df2, by = "CustomerId", all.x = TRUE)

#Right outer:
merge(x = df1, y = df2, by = "CustomerId", all.y = TRUE)

#Cross join: 
merge(x = df1, y = df2, by = NULL)
```

### as. is.
```{R}

!is.na(x)
x[!is.na(x)]
```

###readr package
- http://hadley.nz/
- https://github.com/tidyverse/readr

```{R}
#install.packages("tidyverse")
#library('tidyverse')
#install.packages("readr")
library("readr")

setwd('~/lecture/riii')

read.csv('data/2330.csv',header = T)
stock = read_csv('data/2330.csv',col_names=T)

stock = read_csv('data/2330.csv',col_names=T,col_types = cols(
  Date = col_date(format = ""),
  Open = col_double(),
  High = col_double(),
  Low = col_double(),
  Close = col_double(),
  Volume = col_integer()
))
```

### Flow Control
```{R}
x=5;
if(x>3){
  print("x > 3")
}else{
  print("x <= 3")
}

if(x>3) print("x > 3") else print("x <= 3")

test = ifelse(x>3,"x > 3","x <= 3")
test

data(iris)
iris$new_species = factor(ifelse(iris$Species == "setosa","IsSetosa","NotSetosa"))
str(iris)

x=5;
if(x>3){
  print ("x > 3");
} else if (x ==3){
  print ("x == 3");
}else{
  print("x <= 3");
}

for(i in 1:10){
  print(i)
}

seq(from=1,to=10)

sum=0
for(i in 1:100){
  sum= sum+ i;
}
sum

sum(1:100)

mat = matrix(1:9, byrow=TRUE, nrow=3)
for(i in 1:nrow(mat)){
  for(j in 1:ncol(mat)){
    print(mat[i,j])
  }
}

sum = 0;
cnt = 0;
while(cnt <= 100){
  sum = sum + cnt;
  cnt = cnt + 1;
}
sum
```
